form.name: form1

li.a: AIR TA Admin Manual Full Version

div.style: float:left; width:460px; height:395px; margin-left:18px; border-top:solid 2px #FAC928; border-bottom:solid 2px #FAC928;

div.span: Meals will be available Monday-Friday beginning Tuesday March 17 thru Friday April 3rd. If you have questions call the Board of Education Office at (419)465-2610. Leave a message and someone will return your call as soon as possible. The will be only one delivery each Monday. The delivery will include both breakfast and lunch for the entire week. Deliveries will begin at 7:30am Monday and will run through the morning until completed. Deliveries are available to any Monroeville student in need including Monroeville EHOVE students and St. Joe's students.
Please follow the link below to fill out the Meal Plan Request Form

div.br:
101 West St Monroeville, OH 44847
Office Hours: 7:00 am - 3:00 pm
